title: Intangible Escapes: A Mindful Journey Beckons
description: A collaboration of very relatable thought provoking life expressions to relax with for all ages. Written from experiences that most of us have gone through, told within an intriguing collection of poetry. From the darkest of times to the lightest, the author condenses moments of our typical lives and pensively takes you on a journey that will leave you feeling relaxed and able to envision future prosperities, as well as look back thoughtfully. Intangible Escapes takes the reality to the dreamer and creates a mindscape to lose yourself within. Whether read for minutes or hours, it's a coffee table must-have.
author: Laura-Sophie Roi
